oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Congressman Albert Gore, Sr., 1943
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: Albert Arnold “Al” Gore, Sr., an American politician, serving as a U. S. Representative and a U. S. Senator for the Democratic Party from Tennessee. Gore was first elected to Congress in 1938, a Representative from Tennessee’s 4th district, serving in office from January 3, 1939-January 3, 1953. Gore was United States Senator from Tennessee, in office January 3, 1953-January 3, 1971. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Gore, Albert, 1907-1998
